name: Space Shoot (KalaviGames)
description:
Shoot asteroids with your spaceship and try to get a new highscore!

Normal asteroid - Shoot to get 100 points

Red asteroid - Indestructable, nothing happens when you shoot it.

Health - Touch to get an extra life.

If you run out of lives, you lose. If you get 10 lives, your counter becomes a plus sign and a huge wave of asteroids spawn.
